introduction.title: Sergio Asensio Puyuelo
content: Welcome to my Website!!!

I am a mathematician and programmer analyst with a solid background in web applications development and several programming areas such as: Full Stack Developer (FRONTEND , BACKEND), Web Designer, Web Services Implementation (REST/SOAP),Database Management ...

During my 4 years of experience, I have attended multiple projects managed by different technologies such as Java, Angular, Salesforce and NodeJS, both alone as well as member of qualified teams helping me all of them in my professional growth and development .
By the follow link you can find out more information about all the programming languages that I have dealt with as well as my skill matrix level ;)

currentJob.title: Current Job
content: I currently work as Technical Analyst in Grupo Oesía company in a project related with the residues management for Aragón government.As a full stack technical analyst, some of my main tasks are:
- Analysis and implementation of the FRONTEND and BACKEND functionalities in the most simple and efficient way.
- Define the database tables structure as well as the relation between them.
- Establish the code architecture of main project modules in order to take them as referents to develop new ones.
- Automation and building of the project code.
- Support and knowledge transfer to team´s software developers.

aboutMe.title: About me...
content: I am a so persistent person with my objectives and this is precisely the aspect that I like most about my work, I see my day by day as challenges to defeat the more innovative and challenging they are the more motivated I am.

Two of the most relevant aspects in a project to me are its foundations, and its structure, its foundations because they are its main template and we are able to develop the rest of the modules through them in in the most optimal and efficient way, and its structure, because without a competent and well-organized team where the role and task of each member are well-defined, chaos quick appears.

I hope this website help you to know me a little bit and enjoy it as much as I have enjoyed developing it, if you want to contact me in order to find out more information about my work and experience, do not hesitate to do so through the following link
After joining Deloitte in March (2016), I attended three courses related to the following competences: SAP (ABAP modality), Java and Salesforce.
During my first two years of work experience, I was involved in several maintenance and development Salesforce projects where I grew up as code developer and platform admin.

In June of 2016, I was involved in a project for energy market. In there, we developed an aplication to help salesforce to create cases in emergency peaks.This app was developed in Java, Spring, Hibernate and published in Heroku, with PostgreSQL and HerokuConnect (tool to connect SFDC and fill the data in Postgres).

Thanks to this project and my work team, I learnt and explore the set of tools that a Java Web application offer as: HTML,CSS,jQuery, JSP, Javascript, SQL, REST, AJAX..., the study of the Heroku platform and its synchronization with Salesforce and the use of Talend tool for massive data migration (ETL).

In October of 2017, I was the responsible of the development and publishment in Heroku of a NodeJs Web service app which purpose was the massive user data sending to a SMS sending data Company as well as the storage of the responses received in PostgresSQL. .

This was the first time I carried out a project on my own, and it became an important challenge due to my lack of knowledge about this particular technology. However, my previous experience in Java and constant search for information helped me to learn more about NodeJS, thus gaining experience about asynchronous development methods and creation of REST services.

In March of 2018, I started a new professional adventure as senior developer in IA SOFT company, being my first project an environmental quality and waste management application in Angular 6 and Java (JPA).

In June of 2018 the company sent me to work as external professional in the Seminario of Zaragoza in order to take the responsability of the civil service application (Java Server Faces) and carry out some new modules and functionalities on it.

In May 2019, I was promoted to technical analyst and I was assigned back to my first project where my main role is focused on the definition and implementation of the architecture and functionalities of the new FRONTEND and BACKEND modules of the project, as well as the training and knowledge transfer to team programmers.

educationSection.university: Bachelor Degree in Mathematics by University of Zaragoza (Sept 2011 – Jan 2016).

languageSection.english_s1: Demonstrable speaking and writting upper-intermediate level
languageSection.english_s2: Experience and daily english calls in international projects and as auto-formation

proyect_1.name: Project: AST Residuos
description: Main Techonology:
FRONTEND : Angular 6
BACKEND : Java (JPA)
Tasks / Responsibilities: Technical analyst of the project.
My role was focused on the definition and implementation of the architecture and functionalities of the new FRONTEND and BACKEND modules of the project:
- Definition of creation scripts of the new Oracle tables, relation between them and Bean and Dto java classes related.
- Development of different Angular app components.
- Implementation of BACKEND REST services.
- Import of several client libraries in order to consult their API services by SOAP.
- Automation and building of FRONTEND and BACKEND project code into different environment variables.
- Knowledge transfer and support to team programmers.
Proyect Structure: Angular 6, JPA,Spring Boot, API REST, SOAP, Oracle, Dockers, Apache ANT, Arquitectura de Microservicios, HTML5, Jira, ...

proyect_1.name: Project: Civil Service Application
description: Main Techonology:
FRONTEND : JSPX
BACKEND : Java (Primefaces)

Tasks / Responsibilities: Main and only responsible of a final client proyect where I was in charge of the expansion of several functionalities related to Zaragoza´s civil service app (PrimeFaces – JSPX - SQL).
Proyect Structure: PrimeFaces, JSPX, SQL, Tomahawk, CVS.

proyect_2.name: Project: AST Residuos
description: Main Techonology:
FRONTEND : Angular 7
BACKEND : Java (JPA)

Tasks / Responsibilities: Development of a management system for environmental quality and waste management, a system for the control by the autonomous and central administration of all hazardous and non-hazardous waste produced by the industrial sector.
My role was focused on the technical analysis and development of different Angular components (FRONTEND) and REST services (BACKEND) that were required within the evolution of the project.
Proyect Structure: Angular 7, JPA,Spring Boot, API REST, Oracle, Dockers, Arquitectura de Microservicios, HTML5, Jira, ...

proyect_7.name: Project: Enel – Emergency Chile - Heroku
description: Main Techonology: Java
Tasks / Responsibilities:
Full stack developer in an energy market project to simulate some Salesforce functionalities through a Java Web application.

Thanks to this project, I learnt and explored several set of tools such as: Spring MVC, Spring Hibernate, HTML, CSS, jQuery, JSP, Javascript, SQL, REST, AJAX..., the study of the Heroku platform and its synchronization with Salesforce and the use of Talend tool for massive data migration (ETL)..
Proyect Structure: Spring MVC, PostgresSQL, Maven, Quarz, Heroku, Hibernate, Git, Apache Tomcat.
